   6852  f208				  -	      else
   6853  f208				  -	      cpx	#1
   6854  f208					      endif
   6855  f208		       f0 f8		      beq	servicesfxchannelsdone
   6856  f20a
   6857  f20a		       a5 de		      lda	sfxschedulelock	; =1 if locked
   6858  f20c		       d0 f4		      bne	servicesfxchannelsdone	; exit if a pointer may be mid-way change
   6859  f20e
   6860  f20e		       b5 4e		      lda	sfx1pointlo,x
   6861  f210		       85 dc		      sta	inttemp5
   6862  f212		       15 50		      ora	sfx1pointhi,x
   6863  f214		       f0 ef		      beq	servicesfxchannelsloop
   6864  f216		       b5 50		      lda	sfx1pointhi,x
   6865  f218		       85 dd		      sta	inttemp6
   6866  f21a
   6867  f21a		       b5 58		      lda	sfx1tick,x
   6868  f21c		       f0 05		      beq	servicesfx_cont1	; this chunk is over, load the next!
   6869  f21e		       d6 58		      dec	sfx1tick,x	; frame countdown is non-zero, subtract one
   6870  f220		       4c 05 f2 	      jmp	servicesfxchannelsloop
   6871  f223				   servicesfx_cont1
   6872  f223
   6873  f223		       a0 01		      ldy	#1	; check to see if they're changing the frame countdown
   6874  f225		       b1 dc		      lda	(inttemp5),y
   6875  f227		       c9 10		      cmp	#$10
   6876  f229		       d0 1b		      bne	servicesfx_cont1a
   6877  f22b		       a0 02		      ldy	#2
   6878  f22d		       b1 dc		      lda	(inttemp5),y
   6879  f22f		       95 56		      sta	sfx1frames,x	; change the frame countdown
   6880  f231		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   6881  f233		       95 58		      sta	sfx1tick,x
   6882  f235							; advance the sound pointer by 3...
   6883  f235		       b5 4e		      lda	sfx1pointlo,x
   6884  f237		       18		      clc
   6885  f238		       69 03		      adc	#3
   6886  f23a		       95 4e		      sta	sfx1pointlo,x
   6887  f23c		       b5 50		      lda	sfx1pointhi,x
   6888  f23e		       69 00		      adc	#0
   6889  f240		       95 50		      sta	sfx1pointhi,x
   6890  f242							; and then fetch another sample for this channel...
   6891  f242		       ca		      dex
   6892  f243		       4c 05 f2 	      jmp	servicesfxchannelsloop
   6893  f246				   servicesfx_cont1a
   6894  f246
   6895  f246		       b5 56		      lda	sfx1frames,x	; set the frame countdown for this sound chunk
   6896  f248		       95 58		      sta	sfx1tick,x
   6897  f24a
   6898  f24a		       b5 52		      lda	sfx1priority,x	; decrease the sound's priority if its non-zero
   6899  f24c		       f0 02		      beq	servicesfx_cont2
   6900  f24e		       d6 52		      dec	sfx1priority,x
   6901  f250				   servicesfx_cont2
   6902  f250
   6903  f250		       a0 00		      ldy	#0	; play the sound
   6904  f252		       b1 dc		      lda	(inttemp5),y
   6905  f254		       85 d8		      sta	inttemp1
   6906  f256
   6907  f256				  -	      ifconst	MUSICTRACKER
   6908  f256				  -	      lda	sfx1notedata,x
   6909  f256				  -	      beq	exitmusictracker	; exit if this isn't a pitched instrument
   6910  f256				  -	      ldy	#0
   6911  f256				  -	      sty	inttemp2
   6912  f256				  -	      clc
   6913  f256				  -	      adc	(inttemp5),y
   6914  f256				  -	      asl		; x2
   6915  f256				  -	      tay
   6916  f256				  -	      lda	tiatrackeroctavenotes,y
   6917  f256				  -	      sta	AUDC0,x
   6918  f256				  -	      iny
   6919  f256				  -	      lda	tiatrackeroctavenotes,y
   6920  f256				  -	      sta	AUDF0,x
   6921  f256				  -	      ldy	#1
   6922  f256				  -	      jmp	sfxvolumeentrypt
   6923  f256				  -exitmusictracker
   6924  f256				  -	      lda	inttemp1
   6925  f256					      endif		; MUSICTRACKER
   6926  f256
   6927  f256		       18		      clc
   6928  f257		       75 54		      adc	sfx1poffset,x	; take into account any pitch modification
   6929  f259		       95 17		      sta	AUDF0,x
   6930  f25b		       c8		      iny
   6931  f25c		       b1 dc		      lda	(inttemp5),y
   6932  f25e		       95 15		      sta	AUDC0,x
   6933  f260		       85 d9		      sta	inttemp2
   6934  f262		       c8		      iny
   6935  f263				   sfxvolumeentrypt
   6936  f263				  -	      ifconst	TIAVOLUME
   6937  f263				  -	      lda	tiavolume
   6938  f263				  -	      asl
   6939  f263				  -	      asl
   6940  f263				  -	      asl
   6941  f263				  -	      asl
   6942  f263				  -	      sta	fourbitfadevalueint
   6943  f263					      endif		; TIAVOLUME
   6944  f263		       b1 dc		      lda	(inttemp5),y
   6945  f265				  -	      ifconst	TIAVOLUME
   6946  f265				  -	      jsr	fourbitfadeint
   6947  f265					      endif		; TIAVOLUME
   6948  f265		       95 19		      sta	AUDV0,x
   6949  f267		       c9 10		      cmp	#$10
   6950  f269		       b0 19		      bcs	sfxsoundloop	; AUDV0>$0F means the sound is looped while priority is active
   6951  f26b
   6952  f26b		       05 d9		      ora	inttemp2
   6953  f26d		       05 d8		      ora	inttemp1	; check if F|C|V=0
   6954  f26f		       f0 23		      beq	zerosfx	; if so, we're at the end of the sound.
   6955  f271
   6956  f271				   advancesfxpointer
   6957  f271							; advance the pointer to the next sound chunk
   6958  f271		       c8		      iny
   6959  f272		       84 da		      sty	inttemp3
   6960  f274		       18		      clc
   6961  f275		       b5 4e		      lda	sfx1pointlo,x
   6962  f277		       65 da		      adc	inttemp3
   6963  f279		       95 4e		      sta	sfx1pointlo,x
   6964  f27b		       b5 50		      lda	sfx1pointhi,x
   6965  f27d		       69 00		      adc	#0
   6966  f27f		       95 50		      sta	sfx1pointhi,x
   6967  f281		       4c 05 f2 	      jmp	servicesfxchannelsloop
   6968  f284
   6969  f284				   sfxsoundloop
   6970  f284		       48		      pha
   6971  f285		       b5 52		      lda	sfx1priority,x
   6972  f287		       d0 04		      bne	sfxsoundloop_carryon
   6973  f289		       68		      pla		; fix the stack before we go
   6974  f28a		       4c 71 f2 	      jmp	advancesfxpointer
   6975  f28d				   sfxsoundloop_carryon
   6976  f28d		       68		      pla
   6977  f28e		       29 f0		      and	#$F0
   6978  f290		       4a		      lsr
   6979  f291		       4a		      lsr
   6980  f292		       4a		      lsr
   6981  f293		       4a		      lsr
   6982  f294
   6983  f294				   zerosfx
   6984  f294		       95 4e		      sta	sfx1pointlo,x
   6985  f296		       95 50		      sta	sfx1pointhi,x
   6986  f298		       95 52		      sta	sfx1priority,x
   6987  f29a		       4c 05 f2 	      jmp	servicesfxchannelsloop
   6988  f29d
   6989  f29d
   6990  f29d				   schedulesfx
   6991  f29d							; called with sfxinstrumentlo=<data sfxinstrumenthi=>data sfxpitchoffset=pitch-offset sfxnoteindex=note index
   6992  f29d		       a0 00		      ldy	#0
   6993  f29f				  -	      ifconst	pokeysupport
   6994  f29f				  -	      lda	sfxinstrumenthi
   6995  f29f				  -	      beq	scheduletiasfx	; drums have undefined instrument
   6996  f29f				  -	      lda	(sfxinstrumentlo),y
   6997  f29f				  -	      cmp	#$20	; POKEY?
   6998  f29f				  -	      bne	scheduletiasfx
   6999  f29f				  -	      jmp	schedulepokeysfx
   7000  f29f					      endif
   7001  f29f				   scheduletiasfx
   7002  f29f							;cmp #$10 ; TIA?
   7003  f29f							;beq continuescheduletiasfx
   7004  f29f							; rts ; unhandled!!!
   7005  f29f				   continuescheduletiasfx
   7006  f29f					      ifnconst	TIASFXMONO
   7007  f29f		       a5 50		      lda	sfx1pointhi
   7008  f2a1		       f0 15		      beq	schedulesfx1	;if channel 1 is idle, use it
   7009  f2a3		       a5 51		      lda	sfx2pointhi
   7010  f2a5		       f0 15		      beq	schedulesfx2	;if channel 2 is idle, use it
   7011  f2a7							; Both channels are scheduled.
   7012  f2a7		       a5 e1		      lda	sfxinstrumenthi
   7013  f2a9		       f0 06		      beq	skipscheduledrums
   7014  f2ab		       a0 01		      ldy	#1
   7015  f2ad		       b1 e0		      lda	(sfxinstrumentlo),y
   7016  f2af		       d0 01		      bne	interruptsfx
   7017  f2b1				   skipscheduledrums
   7018  f2b1		       60		      rts		; the new sound has 0 priority and both channels are busy. Skip playing it.
   7019  f2b2				   interruptsfx
   7020  f2b2							;Compare which active sound has a lower priority. We'll interrupt the lower one.
   7021  f2b2		       a5 52		      lda	sfx1priority
   7022  f2b4		       c5 53		      cmp	sfx2priority
   7023  f2b6		       b0 04		      bcs	schedulesfx2
   7024  f2b8					      endif		; !TIASFXMONO
   7025  f2b8
   7026  f2b8				   schedulesfx1
   7027  f2b8		       a2 00		      ldx	#0	; channel 1
   7028  f2ba					      ifnconst	TIASFXMONO
   7029  f2ba		       f0 02		      beq	skipschedulesfx2
   7030  f2bc				   schedulesfx2
   7031  f2bc		       a2 01		      ldx	#1	; channel 2
   7032  f2be				   skipschedulesfx2
   7033  f2be					      endif		; !TIASFXMONO
   7034  f2be
   7035  f2be				  -	      ifconst	MUSICTRACKER
   7036  f2be				  -	      lda	sfxnoteindex
   7037  f2be				  -	      bpl	skipdrumkitoverride
   7038  f2be				  -	      and	#$7F	; subtract 128
   7039  f2be				  -	      sec
   7040  f2be				  -	      sbc	#4	; drums start at 132, i.e. octave 10
   7041  f2be				  -	      asl
   7042  f2be				  -	      tay
   7043  f2be				  -	      lda	tiadrumkitdefinition,y
   7044  f2be				  -	      sta	sfxinstrumentlo
   7045  f2be				  -	      iny
   7046  f2be				  -	      lda	tiadrumkitdefinition,y
   7047  f2be				  -	      sta	sfxinstrumenthi
   7048  f2be				  -	      lda	#0
   7049  f2be				  -	      sta	sfxnoteindex	; and tell the driver it's a non-pitched instrument
   7050  f2be				  -skipdrumkitoverride
   7051  f2be					      endif		; MUSICTRACKER
   7052  f2be		       a0 01		      ldy	#1	; get priority and sound-resolution (in frames)
   7053  f2c0		       b1 e0		      lda	(sfxinstrumentlo),y
   7054  f2c2		       95 52		      sta	sfx1priority,x
   7055  f2c4		       c8		      iny
   7056  f2c5		       b1 e0		      lda	(sfxinstrumentlo),y
   7057  f2c7		       95 56		      sta	sfx1frames,x
   7058  f2c9		       a5 e0		      lda	sfxinstrumentlo
   7059  f2cb		       18		      clc
   7060  f2cc		       69 03		      adc	#3
   7061  f2ce		       95 4e		      sta	sfx1pointlo,x
   7062  f2d0		       a5 e1		      lda	sfxinstrumenthi
   7063  f2d2		       69 00		      adc	#0
   7064  f2d4		       95 50		      sta	sfx1pointhi,x
   7065  f2d6		       a5 e2		      lda	sfxpitchoffset
   7066  f2d8		       95 54		      sta	sfx1poffset,x
   7067  f2da		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   7068  f2dc		       95 58		      sta	sfx1tick,x
   7069  f2de		       a5 e3		      lda	sfxnoteindex
   7070  f2e0		       95 cd		      sta	sfx1notedata,x
   7071  f2e2		       60		      rts
   7072  f2e3
   7073  f2e3				   plotsprite
   7074  f2e3					      ifnconst	NODRAWWAIT
   7075  f2e3				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7076  f2e3				  -	      lda	doublebufferstate
   7077  f2e3				  -	      bne	skipplotspritewait
   7078  f2e3					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7079  f2e3				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   7080  f2e3				  -	      lda	#$41
   7081  f2e3				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   7082  f2e3					      endif
   7083  f2e3				   plotspritewait
   7084  f2e3		       a5 4d		      lda	visibleover
   7085  f2e5		       d0 fc		      bne	plotspritewait
   7086  f2e7				   skipplotspritewait
   7087  f2e7				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   7088  f2e7				  -	      lda	#$0
   7089  f2e7				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   7090  f2e7					      endif
   7091  f2e7					      endif
   7092  f2e7
   7093  f2e7							;arguments:
   7094  f2e7							; temp1=lo graphicdata
   7095  f2e7							; temp2=hi graphicdata
   7096  f2e7							; temp3=palette | width byte
   7097  f2e7							; temp4=x
   7098  f2e7							; temp5=y
   7099  f2e7							; temp6=mode
   7100  f2e7		       a5 46		      lda	temp5	;Y position
   7101  f2e9		       4a		      lsr		; 2 - Divide by 8 or 16
   7102  f2ea		       4a		      lsr		; 2
   7103  f2eb		       4a		      lsr		; 2
   7104  f2ec					      if	WZONEHEIGHT = 16
   7105  f2ec		       4a		      lsr		; 2
   7106  f2ed					      endif
   7107  f2ed
   7108  f2ed		       aa		      tax
   7109  f2ee
   7110  f2ee					      ifnconst	NOLIMITCHECKING
   7111  f2ee
   7112  f2ee							; the next block allows for vertical masking, and ensures we don't overwrite non-DL memory
   7113  f2ee
   7114  f2ee		       c9 0c		      cmp	#WZONECOUNT
   7115  f2f0
   7116  f2f0		       90 0a		      bcc	continueplotsprite1	; the sprite is fully on-screen, so carry on...
   7117  f2f2							; otherwise, check to see if the bottom half is in zone 0...
   7118  f2f2
   7119  f2f2					      if	WZONEHEIGHT = 16
   7120  f2f2		       c9 0f		      cmp	#15
   7121  f2f4				  -	      else
   7122  f2f4				  -	      cmp	#31
   7123  f2f4					      endif
   7124  f2f4
   7125  f2f4		       d0 05		      bne	exitplotsprite1
   7126  f2f6		       a2 00		      ldx	#0
   7127  f2f8		       4c 31 f3 	      jmp	continueplotsprite2
   7128  f2fb				   exitplotsprite1
   7129  f2fb		       60		      rts
   7130  f2fc
   7131  f2fc				   continueplotsprite1
   7132  f2fc					      endif
   7133  f2fc
   7134  f2fc				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7135  f2fc				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
   7136  f2fc				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
   7137  f2fc					      else		; !VSCROLL
   7138  f2fc		       bd 14 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to DL that this sprite starts in
   7139  f2ff					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   7140  f2ff				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7141  f2ff				  -	      clc
   7142  f2ff				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   7143  f2ff					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7144  f2ff		       85 63		      sta	dlpnt
   7145  f301				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7146  f301				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
   7147  f301					      else		; !VSCROLL
   7148  f301		       bd 08 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   7149  f304					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   7150  f304				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7151  f304				  -	      adc	#0
   7152  f304					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7153  f304		       85 64		      sta	dlpnt+1
   7154  f306
   7155  f306							;Create DL entry for upper part of sprite
   7156  f306
   7157  f306		       b4 65		      ldy	dlend,x	;Get the index to the end of this DL
   7158  f308
   7159  f308				  -	      ifconst	CHECKOVERWRITE
   7160  f308				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   7161  f308				  -	      beq	checkcontinueplotsprite2
   7162  f308				  -continueplotsprite1a
   7163  f308					      endif
   7164  f308
   7165  f308		       a5 42		      lda	temp1	; graphic data, lo byte
   7166  f30a		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;Low byte of data address
   7167  f30c
   7168  f30c					      ifnconst	ATOMICSPRITEUPDATE
   7169  f30c		       c8		      iny
   7170  f30d		       a5 47		      lda	temp6
   7171  f30f		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7172  f311				  -	      else
   7173  f311				  -	      iny
   7174  f311				  -	      sty	temp8
   7175  f311					      endif
   7176  f311
   7177  f311		       c8		      iny
   7178  f312
   7179  f312		       a5 46		      lda	temp5	;Y position
   7180  f314		       29 0f		      and	#(WZONEHEIGHT - 1)
   7181  f316		       c9 01		      cmp	#1	; clear carry if our sprite is just in this zone
   7182  f318		       05 43		      ora	temp2	; graphic data, hi byte
   7183  f31a		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7184  f31c
   7185  f31c		       c8		      iny
   7186  f31d		       a5 44		      lda	temp3	;palette|width
   7187  f31f		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7188  f321
   7189  f321		       c8		      iny
   7190  f322		       a5 45		      lda	temp4	;Horizontal position
   7191  f324		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7192  f326
   7193  f326		       c8		      iny
   7194  f327		       94 65		      sty	dlend,x
   7195  f329
   7196  f329				  -	      ifconst	ALWAYSTERMINATE
   7197  f329				  -	      iny
   7198  f329				  -	      lda	#0
   7199  f329				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7200  f329					      endif
   7201  f329
   7202  f329				  -	      ifconst	ATOMICSPRITEUPDATE
   7203  f329				  -	      ldy	temp8
   7204  f329				  -	      lda	temp6
   7205  f329				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7206  f329					      endif
   7207  f329
   7208  f329				   checkcontinueplotsprite2
   7209  f329
   7210  f329		       90 33		      bcc	doneSPDL	;branch if the sprite was fully in the last zone
   7211  f32b
   7212  f32b							;Create DL entry for lower part of sprite
   7213  f32b
   7214  f32b		       e8		      inx		;Next region
   7215  f32c
   7216  f32c					      ifnconst	NOLIMITCHECKING
   7217  f32c		       e0 0c		      cpx	#WZONECOUNT
   7218  f32e
   7219  f32e		       90 01		      bcc	continueplotsprite2	; the second half of the sprite is fully on-screen, so carry on...
   7220  f330		       60		      rts
   7221  f331				   continueplotsprite2
   7222  f331					      endif
   7223  f331
   7224  f331				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7225  f331				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
   7226  f331				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
   7227  f331					      else		; !VSCROLL
   7228  f331		       bd 14 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to next DL
   7229  f334					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   7230  f334				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7231  f334				  -	      clc
   7232  f334				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   7233  f334					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7234  f334		       85 63		      sta	dlpnt
   7235  f336				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7236  f336				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
   7237  f336					      else		; !VSCROLL
   7238  f336		       bd 08 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   7239  f339					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   7240  f339				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7241  f339				  -	      adc	#0
   7242  f339					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7243  f339		       85 64		      sta	dlpnt+1
   7244  f33b		       b4 65		      ldy	dlend,x	;Get the index to the end of this DL
   7245  f33d
   7246  f33d				  -	      ifconst	CHECKOVERWRITE
   7247  f33d				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   7248  f33d				  -	      bne	continueplotsprite2a
   7249  f33d				  -	      rts
   7250  f33d				  -continueplotsprite2a
   7251  f33d					      endif
   7252  f33d
   7253  f33d		       a5 42		      lda	temp1	; graphic data, lo byte
   7254  f33f		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7255  f341
   7256  f341					      ifnconst	ATOMICSPRITEUPDATE
   7257  f341		       c8		      iny
   7258  f342		       a5 47		      lda	temp6
   7259  f344		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7260  f346				  -	      else
   7261  f346				  -	      iny
   7262  f346				  -	      sty	temp8
   7263  f346					      endif
   7264  f346
   7265  f346		       c8		      iny
   7266  f347
   7267  f347		       a5 46		      lda	temp5	;Y position
   7268  f349		       0b 0f		      anc	#(WZONEHEIGHT - 1)	; undocumented. A=A&IMM, then move bit 7 into carry
   7269  f34b		       05 43		      ora	temp2	; graphic data, hi byte
   7270  f34d		       e9 0f		      sbc	#(WZONEHEIGHT-1)	; start at the DMA hole. -1 because carry is clear
   7271  f34f		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7272  f351
   7273  f351		       c8		      iny
   7274  f352
   7275  f352		       a5 44		      lda	temp3	;palette|width
   7276  f354		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7277  f356
   7278  f356		       c8		      iny
   7279  f357
   7280  f357		       a5 45		      lda	temp4	;Horizontal position
   7281  f359		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7282  f35b
   7283  f35b		       c8		      iny
   7284  f35c		       94 65		      sty	dlend,x
   7285  f35e
   7286  f35e				  -	      ifconst	ALWAYSTERMINATE
   7287  f35e				  -	      iny
   7288  f35e				  -	      lda	#0
   7289  f35e				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7290  f35e					      endif
   7291  f35e
   7292  f35e				  -	      ifconst	ATOMICSPRITEUPDATE
   7293  f35e				  -	      ldy	temp8
   7294  f35e				  -	      lda	temp6
   7295  f35e				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7296  f35e					      endif
   7297  f35e
   7298  f35e				   doneSPDL
   7299  f35e		       60		      rts
   7300  f35f
   7301  f35f				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7302  f35f				  -			; x3 table for fast DLL parsing
   7303  f35f				  -Xx3
   7304  f35f				  -	      .byte	0,3,6,9,12,15,18,21,24,27
   7305  f35f				  -	      .byte	30,33,36,39,42,45,48,51,54,57
   7306  f35f				  -	      .byte	60,63,66,69,72,75,78,81,84,87
   7307  f35f				  -maskscrollsprite
   7308  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,%11000000,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),0,160	; 5*2 + 32*3 = 106 cycles
   7309  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,1,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),160	; 4*2 + 31*3 = 101 cycles
   7310  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,1,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),160	; 4*2 + 31*3 = 101 cycles
   7311  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,1,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),160	; 4*2 + 31*3 = 101 cycles
   7312  f35f				  -	      .byte	$00,%01000000,($D0+WZONEHEIGHT),16,160	; 5*2 + 16*3 =  58 cycles
   7313  f35f				  -			; MAX	============ 467 cycles
   7314  f35f				  -			; MIN	============  59 cycles
   7315  f35f				  -maskscrollspriteend
   7316  f35f					      endif		; VSCROLL
   7317  f35f
   7318  f35f				   lockzonex
   7319  f35f				  -	      ifconst	ZONELOCKS
   7320  f35f				  -	      ldy	dlend,x
   7321  f35f				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   7322  f35f				  -	      beq	lockzonexreturn	; the zone is either stuffed or locked. abort!
   7323  f35f				  -	      lda	DLPOINTL,x
   7324  f35f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7325  f35f				  -	      clc
   7326  f35f				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   7327  f35f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7328  f35f				  -	      sta	dlpnt
   7329  f35f				  -	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   7330  f35f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7331  f35f				  -	      adc	#0
   7332  f35f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7333  f35f				  -	      sta	dlpnt+1
   7334  f35f				  -	      iny
   7335  f35f				  -	      lda	#0
   7336  f35f				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7337  f35f				  -	      dey
   7338  f35f				  -	      tya
   7339  f35f				  -	      ldy	#(DLLASTOBJ-1)
   7340  f35f				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y
   7341  f35f				  -	      iny
   7342  f35f				  -	      sty	dlend,x
   7343  f35f				  -lockzonexreturn
   7344  f35f				  -	      rts
   7345  f35f					      endif		; ZONELOCKS
   7346  f35f				   unlockzonex
   7347  f35f				  -	      ifconst	ZONELOCKS
   7348  f35f				  -	      ldy	dlend,x
   7349  f35f				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   7350  f35f				  -	      bne	unlockzonexreturn	; if the zone isn't stuffed, it's not locked. abort!
   7351  f35f				  -	      lda	DLPOINTL,x
   7352  f35f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7353  f35f				  -	      clc
   7354  f35f				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   7355  f35f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7356  f35f				  -	      sta	dlpnt
   7357  f35f				  -	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   7358  f35f				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7359  f35f				  -	      adc	#0
   7360  f35f				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7361  f35f				  -	      sta	dlpnt+1
   7362  f35f				  -	      dey
   7363  f35f				  -	      lda	(dlpnt),y
   7364  f35f				  -	      tay
   7365  f35f				  -	      sty	dlend,x
   7366  f35f				  -unlockzonexreturn
   7367  f35f					      endif		; ZONELOCKS
   7368  f35f		       60		      rts
   7369  f360
   7370  f360				   plotcharloop
   7371  f360							; ** read from a data indirectly pointed to from temp8,temp9
   7372  f360							; ** format is: lo_data, hi_data, palette|width, x, y
   7373  f360							; ** format ends with lo_data | hi_data = 0
   7374  f360
   7375  f360				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7376  f360				  -	      lda	doublebufferstate
   7377  f360				  -	      bne	skipplotcharloopwait
   7378  f360					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7379  f360				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   7380  f360				  -	      lda	#$61
   7381  f360				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   7382  f360					      endif
   7383  f360				   plotcharloopwait
   7384  f360		       a5 4d		      lda	visibleover
   7385  f362		       d0 fc		      bne	plotcharloopwait
   7386  f364				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   7387  f364				  -	      lda	#0
   7388  f364				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   7389  f364					      endif
   7390  f364				   skipplotcharloopwait
   7391  f364				   plotcharlooploop
   7392  f364		       a0 00		      ldy	#0
   7393  f366		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
   7394  f368		       85 42		      sta	temp1
   7395  f36a		       c8		      iny
   7396  f36b		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
   7397  f36d		       85 43		      sta	temp2
   7398  f36f		       05 42		      ora	temp1
   7399  f371		       d0 01		      bne	plotcharloopcontinue
   7400  f373							;the pointer=0, so return
   7401  f373		       60		      rts
   7402  f374				   plotcharloopcontinue
   7403  f374		       c8		      iny
   7404  f375		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
   7405  f377		       85 44		      sta	temp3
   7406  f379		       c8		      iny
   7407  f37a		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
   7408  f37c		       85 45		      sta	temp4
   7409  f37e		       c8		      iny
   7410  f37f		       b1 49		      lda	(temp8),y
   7411  f381							;sta temp5 ; not needed with our late entry.
   7412  f381		       20 9a f3 	      jsr	plotcharactersskipentry
   7413  f384		       a5 49		      lda	temp8
   7414  f386		       18		      clc
   7415  f387		       69 05		      adc	#5
   7416  f389		       85 49		      sta	temp8
   7417  f38b		       a5 4a		      lda	temp9
   7418  f38d		       69 00		      adc	#0
   7419  f38f		       85 4a		      sta	temp9
   7420  f391		       4c 64 f3 	      jmp	plotcharlooploop
   7421  f394
   7422  f394				   plotcharacters
   7423  f394				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7424  f394				  -	      lda	doublebufferstate
   7425  f394				  -	      bne	skipplotcharacterswait
   7426  f394					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7427  f394				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   7428  f394				  -	      lda	#$41
   7429  f394				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   7430  f394					      endif
   7431  f394				   plotcharacterswait
   7432  f394		       a5 4d		      lda	visibleover
   7433  f396		       d0 fc		      bne	plotcharacterswait
   7434  f398				  -	      ifconst	DEBUGWAITCOLOR
   7435  f398				  -	      sta	BACKGRND
   7436  f398					      endif
   7437  f398				   skipplotcharacterswait
   7438  f398							;arguments:
   7439  f398							; temp1=lo charactermap
   7440  f398							; temp2=hi charactermap
   7441  f398							; temp3=palette | width byte
   7442  f398							; temp4=x
   7443  f398							; temp5=y
   7444  f398
   7445  f398		       a5 46		      lda	temp5	;Y position
   7446  f39a
   7447  f39a				   plotcharactersskipentry
   7448  f39a
   7449  f39a							;ifconst ZONEHEIGHT
   7450  f39a							; if ZONEHEIGHT = 16
   7451  f39a							; and #$0F
   7452  f39a							; endif
   7453  f39a							; if ZONEHEIGHT = 8
   7454  f39a							; and #$1F
   7455  f39a							; endif
   7456  f39a							;else
   7457  f39a							; and #$0F
   7458  f39a							;endif
   7459  f39a
   7460  f39a		       aa		      tax
   7461  f39b
   7462  f39b				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7463  f39b				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
   7464  f39b				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
   7465  f39b					      else		; !VSCROLL
   7466  f39b		       bd 14 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to DL that the characters are in
   7467  f39e					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   7468  f39e				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7469  f39e				  -	      clc
   7470  f39e				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   7471  f39e					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7472  f39e		       85 63		      sta	dlpnt
   7473  f3a0				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7474  f3a0				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
   7475  f3a0					      else		; !VSCROLL
   7476  f3a0		       bd 08 f5 	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   7477  f3a3					      endif		; !VSCROLL
   7478  f3a3				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7479  f3a3				  -	      adc	#0
   7480  f3a3					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7481  f3a3		       85 64		      sta	dlpnt+1
   7482  f3a5
   7483  f3a5							;Create DL entry for the characters
   7484  f3a5
   7485  f3a5		       b4 65		      ldy	dlend,x	;Get the index to the end of this DL
   7486  f3a7
   7487  f3a7				  -	      ifconst	CHECKOVERWRITE
   7488  f3a7				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   7489  f3a7				  -	      bne	continueplotcharacters
   7490  f3a7				  -	      rts
   7491  f3a7				  -continueplotcharacters
   7492  f3a7					      endif
   7493  f3a7
   7494  f3a7		       a5 42		      lda	temp1	; character map data, lo byte
   7495  f3a9		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(1) store low address
   7496  f3ab
   7497  f3ab		       c8		      iny
   7498  f3ac		       ad 06 21 	      lda	charactermode
   7499  f3af		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(2) store mode
   7500  f3b1
   7501  f3b1		       c8		      iny
   7502  f3b2		       a5 43		      lda	temp2	; character map, hi byte
   7503  f3b4		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(3) store high address
   7504  f3b6
   7505  f3b6		       c8		      iny
   7506  f3b7		       a5 44		      lda	temp3	;palette|width
   7507  f3b9		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(4) store palette|width
   7508  f3bb
   7509  f3bb		       c8		      iny
   7510  f3bc		       a5 45		      lda	temp4	;Horizontal position
   7511  f3be		       91 63		      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(5) store horizontal position
   7512  f3c0
   7513  f3c0		       c8		      iny
   7514  f3c1		       94 65		      sty	dlend,x	; save display list end byte
   7515  f3c3		       60		      rts
   7516  f3c4
   7517  f3c4
   7518  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	plotvalueonscreen
   7519  f3c4				  -plotcharacterslive
   7520  f3c4				  -			; a version of plotcharacters that draws live and minimally disrupts the screen...
   7521  f3c4				  -
   7522  f3c4				  -			;arguments:
   7523  f3c4				  -			; temp1=lo charactermap
   7524  f3c4				  -			; temp2=hi charactermap
   7525  f3c4				  -			; temp3=palette | width byte
   7526  f3c4				  -			; temp4=x
   7527  f3c4				  -			; temp5=y
   7528  f3c4				  -
   7529  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp5	;Y position
   7530  f3c4				  -
   7531  f3c4				  -	      tax
   7532  f3c4				  -
   7533  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7534  f3c4				  -	      ldy	Xx3,x
   7535  f3c4				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+11,y
   7536  f3c4				  -	      else		; !VSCROLL
   7537  f3c4				  -	      lda	DLPOINTL,x	;Get pointer to DL that the characters are in
   7538  f3c4				  -	      endif		; !VSCROLL
   7539  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7540  f3c4				  -	      clc
   7541  f3c4				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   7542  f3c4				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7543  f3c4				  -	      sta	dlpnt
   7544  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	VSCROLL
   7545  f3c4				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+10,y
   7546  f3c4				  -	      else		; !VSCROLL
   7547  f3c4				  -	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   7548  f3c4				  -	      endif		; !VSCROLL
   7549  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   7550  f3c4				  -	      adc	#0
   7551  f3c4				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   7552  f3c4				  -	      sta	dlpnt+1
   7553  f3c4				  -
   7554  f3c4				  -			;Create DL entry for the characters
   7555  f3c4				  -
   7556  f3c4				  -	      ldy	dlend,x	;Get the index to the end of this DL
   7557  f3c4				  -
   7558  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	CHECKOVERWRITE
   7559  f3c4				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   7560  f3c4				  -	      bne	continueplotcharacterslive
   7561  f3c4				  -	      rts
   7562  f3c4				  -continueplotcharacterslive
   7563  f3c4				  -	      endif
   7564  f3c4				  -
   7565  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp1	; character map data, lo byte
   7566  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(1) store low address
   7567  f3c4				  -
   7568  f3c4				  -	      iny
   7569  f3c4				  -			; we don't add the second byte yet, since the charmap could briefly
   7570  f3c4				  -			; render without a proper character map address, width, or position.
   7571  f3c4				  -	      lda	charactermode
   7572  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(2) store mode
   7573  f3c4				  -
   7574  f3c4				  -	      iny
   7575  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp2	; character map, hi byte
   7576  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(3) store high address
   7577  f3c4				  -
   7578  f3c4				  -	      iny
   7579  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp3	;palette|width
   7580  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(4) store palette|width
   7581  f3c4				  -
   7582  f3c4				  -	      iny
   7583  f3c4				  -	      lda	temp4	;Horizontal position
   7584  f3c4				  -	      sta	(dlpnt),y	;(5) store horizontal position
   7585  f3c4				  -
   7586  f3c4				  -	      iny
   7587  f3c4				  -	      sty	dlend,x	; save display list end byte
   7588  f3c4				  -
   7589  f3c4				  -	      rts
   7590  f3c4					      endif		;plotcharacterslive
   7591  f3c4
   7592  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	USED_PLOTVALUE
   7593  f3c4				  -plotvalue
   7594  f3c4				  -			; calling 7800basic command:
   7595  f3c4				  -			; plotvalue digit_gfx palette variable/data number_of_digits screen_x screen_y
   7596  f3c4				  -			; ...displays the variable as BCD digits
   7597  f3c4				  -			;
   7598  f3c4				  -			; asm sub arguments:
   7599  f3c4				  -			; temp1=lo charactermap
   7600  f3c4				  -			; temp2=hi charactermap
   7601  f3c4				  -			; temp3=palette | width byte
   7602  f3c4				  -			; temp4=x
   7603  f3c4				  -			; temp5=y
   7604  f3c4				  -			; temp6=number of digits
   7605  f3c4				  -			; temp7=lo variable
   7606  f3c4				  -			; temp8=hi variable
   7607  f3c4				  -			; temp9=character mode
   7608  f3c4				  -
   7609  f3c4				  -plotdigitcount =	temp6
   7610  f3c4				  -
   7611  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	ZONELOCKS
   7612  f3c4				  -	      ldx	temp5
   7613  f3c4				  -	      ldy	dlend,x
   7614  f3c4				  -	      cpy	#DLLASTOBJ
   7615  f3c4				  -	      bne	carryonplotvalue
   7616  f3c4				  -	      rts
   7617  f3c4				  -carryonplotvalue
   7618  f3c4				  -	      endif
   7619  f3c4				  -
   7620  f3c4				  -	      lda	#0
   7621  f3c4				  -	      tay
   7622  f3c4				  -	      ldx	valbufend
   7623  f3c4				  -
   7624  f3c4				  -	      lda	plotdigitcount
   7625  f3c4				  -	      and	#1
   7626  f3c4				  -	      beq	pvnibble2char
   7627  f3c4				  -	      lda	#0
   7628  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x	; just in case we skip this digit
   7629  f3c4				  -	      beq	pvnibble2char_skipnibble
   7630  f3c4				  -
   7631  f3c4				  -pvnibble2char
   7632  f3c4				  -			; high nibble...
   7633  f3c4				  -	      lda	(temp7),y
   7634  f3c4				  -	      and	#$f0
   7635  f3c4				  -	      lsr
   7636  f3c4				  -	      lsr
   7637  f3c4				  -	      lsr
   7638  f3c4				  -	      ifnconst	DOUBLEWIDE	; multiply value by 2 for double-width
   7639  f3c4				  -	      lsr
   7640  f3c4				  -	      endif
   7641  f3c4				  -
   7642  f3c4				  -	      clc
   7643  f3c4				  -	      adc	temp1	; add the offset to character graphics to our value
   7644  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
   7645  f3c4				  -	      inx
   7646  f3c4				  -	      dec	plotdigitcount
   7647  f3c4				  -
   7648  f3c4				  -pvnibble2char_skipnibble
   7649  f3c4				  -			; low nibble...
   7650  f3c4				  -	      lda	(temp7),y
   7651  f3c4				  -	      and	#$0f
   7652  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEWIDE	; multiply value by 2 for double-width
   7653  f3c4				  -	      asl
   7654  f3c4				  -	      endif
   7655  f3c4				  -	      clc
   7656  f3c4				  -	      adc	temp1	; add the offset to character graphics to our value
   7657  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
   7658  f3c4				  -	      inx
   7659  f3c4				  -	      iny
   7660  f3c4				  -
   7661  f3c4				  -	      dec	plotdigitcount
   7662  f3c4				  -	      bne	pvnibble2char
   7663  f3c4				  -
   7664  f3c4				  -			;point to the start of our valuebuffer
   7665  f3c4				  -	      clc
   7666  f3c4				  -	      lda	#<VALBUFFER
   7667  f3c4				  -	      adc	valbufend
   7668  f3c4				  -	      sta	temp1
   7669  f3c4				  -	      lda	#>VALBUFFER
   7670  f3c4				  -	      adc	#0
   7671  f3c4				  -	      sta	temp2
   7672  f3c4				  -
   7673  f3c4				  -			;advance valbufend to the end of our value buffer
   7674  f3c4				  -	      stx	valbufend
   7675  f3c4				  -
   7676  f3c4				  -	      ifnconst	plotvalueonscreen
   7677  f3c4				  -	      jmp	plotcharacters
   7678  f3c4				  -	      else
   7679  f3c4				  -	      jmp	plotcharacterslive
   7680  f3c4				  -	      endif
   7681  f3c4				  -
   7682  f3c4					      endif		; USED_PLOTVALUE
   7683  f3c4
   7684  f3c4
   7685  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	USED_PLOTVALUEEXTRA
   7686  f3c4				  -plotdigitcount =	temp6
   7687  f3c4				  -plotvalueextra
   7688  f3c4				  -			; calling 7800basic command:
   7689  f3c4				  -			; plotvalue digit_gfx palette variable/data number_of_digits screen_x screen_y
   7690  f3c4				  -			; ...displays the variable as BCD digits
   7691  f3c4				  -			;
   7692  f3c4				  -			; asm sub arguments:
   7693  f3c4				  -			; temp1=lo charactermap
   7694  f3c4				  -			; temp2=hi charactermap
   7695  f3c4				  -			; temp3=palette | width byte
   7696  f3c4				  -			; temp4=x
   7697  f3c4				  -			; temp5=y
   7698  f3c4				  -			; temp6=number of digits
   7699  f3c4				  -			; temp7=lo variable
   7700  f3c4				  -			; temp8=hi variable
   7701  f3c4				  -
   7702  f3c4				  -	      lda	#0
   7703  f3c4				  -	      tay
   7704  f3c4				  -	      ldx	valbufend
   7705  f3c4				  -	      ifnconst	plotvalueonscreen
   7706  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
   7707  f3c4				  -	      endif
   7708  f3c4				  -
   7709  f3c4				  -	      lda	plotdigitcount
   7710  f3c4				  -	      and	#1
   7711  f3c4				  -
   7712  f3c4				  -	      bne	pvnibble2char_skipnibbleextra
   7713  f3c4				  -
   7714  f3c4				  -pvnibble2charextra
   7715  f3c4				  -			; high nibble...
   7716  f3c4				  -	      lda	(temp7),y
   7717  f3c4				  -	      and	#$f0
   7718  f3c4				  -	      lsr
   7719  f3c4				  -	      lsr
   7720  f3c4				  -	      ifnconst	DOUBLEWIDE	; multiply value by 2 for double-width
   7721  f3c4				  -	      lsr
   7722  f3c4				  -	      endif
   7723  f3c4				  -	      clc
   7724  f3c4				  -	      adc	temp1	; add the offset to character graphics to our value
   7725  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
   7726  f3c4				  -	      inx
   7727  f3c4				  -
   7728  f3c4				  -			; second half of the digit
   7729  f3c4				  -	      clc
   7730  f3c4				  -	      adc	#1
   7731  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
   7732  f3c4				  -	      inx
   7733  f3c4				  -	      dec	plotdigitcount
   7734  f3c4				  -
   7735  f3c4				  -pvnibble2char_skipnibbleextra
   7736  f3c4				  -			; low nibble...
   7737  f3c4				  -	      lda	(temp7),y
   7738  f3c4				  -	      and	#$0f
   7739  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEWIDE	; multiply value by 2 for double-width
   7740  f3c4				  -	      asl
   7741  f3c4				  -	      endif
   7742  f3c4				  -	      asl
   7743  f3c4				  -
   7744  f3c4				  -	      clc
   7745  f3c4				  -	      adc	temp1	; add the offset to character graphics to our value
   7746  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
   7747  f3c4				  -	      inx
   7748  f3c4				  -
   7749  f3c4				  -	      clc
   7750  f3c4				  -	      adc	#1
   7751  f3c4				  -	      sta	VALBUFFER,x
   7752  f3c4				  -	      inx
   7753  f3c4				  -	      iny
   7754  f3c4				  -
   7755  f3c4				  -	      dec	plotdigitcount
   7756  f3c4				  -	      bne	pvnibble2charextra
   7757  f3c4				  -
   7758  f3c4				  -			;point to the start of our valuebuffer
   7759  f3c4				  -	      clc
   7760  f3c4				  -	      lda	#<VALBUFFER
   7761  f3c4				  -	      adc	valbufend
   7762  f3c4				  -	      sta	temp1
   7763  f3c4				  -	      lda	#>VALBUFFER
   7764  f3c4				  -	      adc	#0
   7765  f3c4				  -	      sta	temp2
   7766  f3c4				  -
   7767  f3c4				  -			;advance valbufend to the end of our value buffer
   7768  f3c4				  -	      stx	valbufend
   7769  f3c4				  -
   7770  f3c4				  -	      ifnconst	plotvalueonscreen
   7771  f3c4				  -	      jmp	plotcharacters
   7772  f3c4				  -	      else
   7773  f3c4				  -	      jmp	plotcharacterslive
   7774  f3c4				  -	      endif
   7775  f3c4					      endif		; USED_PLOTVALUEEXTRA
   7776  f3c4
   7777  f3c4				   boxcollision
   7778  f3c4				  -	      ifconst	BOXCOLLISION
   7779  f3c4				  -			; the worst case cycle-time for the code below is 43 cycles.
   7780  f3c4				  -			; unfortunately, prior to getting here we've burned 44 cycles in argument setup. eep!
   7781  f3c4				  -
   7782  f3c4				  -			;__boxx1 = accumulator
   7783  f3c4				  -			;__boxy1 = y
   7784  f3c4				  -__boxw1    =	temp3
   7785  f3c4				  -__boxh1    =	temp4
   7786  f3c4				  -
   7787  f3c4				  -__boxx2    =	temp5
   7788  f3c4				  -__boxy2    =	temp6
   7789  f3c4				  -__boxw2    =	temp7
   7790  f3c4				  -__boxh2    =	temp8
   7791  f3c4				  -
   7792  f3c4				  -DoXCollisionCheck
   7793  f3c4				  -			;lda __boxx1 ; skipped. already in the accumulator
   7794  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxx2	;3
   7795  f3c4				  -	      bcs	X1isbiggerthanX2	;2/3
   7796  f3c4				  -X2isbiggerthanX1
   7797  f3c4				  -			; carry is clear
   7798  f3c4				  -	      adc	__boxw1	;3
   7799  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxx2	;3
   7800  f3c4				  -	      bcs	DoYCollisionCheck	;3/2
   7801  f3c4				  -	      rts		;6 - carry clear, no collision
   7802  f3c4				  -X1isbiggerthanX2
   7803  f3c4				  -	      clc		;2
   7804  f3c4				  -	      sbc	__boxw2	;3
   7805  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxx2	;3
   7806  f3c4				  -	      bcs	noboxcollision	;3/2
   7807  f3c4				  -DoYCollisionCheck
   7808  f3c4				  -	      tya		; 2 ; use to be "lda __boxy1"
   7809  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxy2	;3
   7810  f3c4				  -	      bcs	Y1isbiggerthanY2	;3/2
   7811  f3c4				  -Y2isbiggerthanY1
   7812  f3c4				  -			; carry is clear
   7813  f3c4				  -	      adc	__boxh1	;3
   7814  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxy2	;3
   7815  f3c4				  -	      rts		;6
   7816  f3c4				  -Y1isbiggerthanY2
   7817  f3c4				  -	      clc		;2
   7818  f3c4				  -	      sbc	__boxh2	;3
   7819  f3c4				  -	      cmp	__boxy2	;3
   7820  f3c4				  -	      bcs	noboxcollision	;3/2
   7821  f3c4				  -yesboxcollision
   7822  f3c4				  -	      sec		;2
   7823  f3c4				  -	      rts		;6
   7824  f3c4				  -noboxcollision
   7825  f3c4				  -	      clc		;2
   7826  f3c4				  -	      rts		;6
   7827  f3c4					      endif		; BOXCOLLISION
   7828  f3c4
   7829  f3c4				   randomize
   7830  f3c4		       a5 40		      lda	rand
   7831  f3c6		       4a		      lsr
   7832  f3c7		       26 41		      rol	rand16
   7833  f3c9		       90 02		      bcc	noeor
   7834  f3cb		       49 b4		      eor	#$B4
   7835  f3cd				   noeor
   7836  f3cd		       85 40		      sta	rand
   7837  f3cf		       45 41		      eor	rand16
   7838  f3d1		       60		      rts
   7839  f3d2
   7840  f3d2							; *** bcd conversion routine courtesy Omegamatrix
   7841  f3d2							; *** http://atariage.com/forums/blog/563/entry-10832-hex-to-bcd-conversion-0-99/
   7842  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_converttobcd
   7843  f3d2				  -converttobcd
   7844  f3d2				  -			;value to convert is in the accumulator
   7845  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp1
   7846  f3d2				  -	      lsr
   7847  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp1
   7848  f3d2				  -	      ror
   7849  f3d2				  -	      lsr
   7850  f3d2				  -	      lsr
   7851  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp1
   7852  f3d2				  -	      ror
   7853  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp1
   7854  f3d2				  -	      ror
   7855  f3d2				  -	      lsr
   7856  f3d2				  -	      and	#$3C
   7857  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp2
   7858  f3d2				  -	      lsr
   7859  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp2
   7860  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp1
   7861  f3d2				  -	      rts		; return the result in the accumulator
   7862  f3d2					      endif		; .calledfunction_converttobcd
   7863  f3d2
   7864  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_mul8
   7865  f3d2				  -			; Y and A contain multiplicands, result in A
   7866  f3d2				  -mul8
   7867  f3d2				  -	      sty	temp1
   7868  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp2
   7869  f3d2				  -	      lda	#0
   7870  f3d2				  -reptmul8
   7871  f3d2				  -	      lsr	temp2
   7872  f3d2				  -	      bcc	skipmul8
   7873  f3d2				  -	      clc
   7874  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp1
   7875  f3d2				  -			;bcs donemul8 might save cycles?
   7876  f3d2				  -skipmul8
   7877  f3d2				  -			;beq donemul8 might save cycles?
   7878  f3d2				  -	      asl	temp1
   7879  f3d2				  -	      bne	reptmul8
   7880  f3d2				  -donemul8
   7881  f3d2				  -	      rts
   7882  f3d2					      endif		; .calledfunction_mul8
   7883  f3d2
   7884  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_div8
   7885  f3d2				  -div8
   7886  f3d2				  -			; A=numerator Y=denominator, result in A
   7887  f3d2				  -	      cpy	#2
   7888  f3d2				  -	      bcc	div8end+1	;div by 0 = bad, div by 1=no calc needed, so bail out
   7889  f3d2				  -	      sty	temp1
   7890  f3d2				  -	      ldy	#$ff
   7891  f3d2				  -div8loop
   7892  f3d2				  -	      sbc	temp1
   7893  f3d2				  -	      iny
   7894  f3d2				  -	      bcs	div8loop
   7895  f3d2				  -div8end
   7896  f3d2				  -	      tya
   7897  f3d2				  -			; result in A
   7898  f3d2				  -	      rts
   7899  f3d2					      endif		; .calledfunction_div8
   7900  f3d2
   7901  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_mul16
   7902  f3d2				  -			; Y and A contain multiplicands, result in temp2,A=low, temp1=high
   7903  f3d2				  -mul16
   7904  f3d2				  -	      sty	temp1
   7905  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp2
   7906  f3d2				  -
   7907  f3d2				  -	      lda	#0
   7908  f3d2				  -	      ldx	#8
   7909  f3d2				  -	      lsr	temp1
   7910  f3d2				  -mul16_1
   7911  f3d2				  -	      bcc	mul16_2
   7912  f3d2				  -	      clc
   7913  f3d2				  -	      adc	temp2
   7914  f3d2				  -mul16_2
   7915  f3d2				  -	      ror
   7916  f3d2				  -	      ror	temp1
   7917  f3d2				  -	      dex
   7918  f3d2				  -	      bne	mul16_1
   7919  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp2
   7920  f3d2				  -	      rts
   7921  f3d2					      endif		; .calledfunction_mul16
   7922  f3d2
   7923  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	.calledfunction_div16
   7924  f3d2				  -			; div int/int
   7925  f3d2				  -			; numerator in A, denom in temp1
   7926  f3d2				  -			; returns with quotient in A, remainder in temp1
   7927  f3d2				  -div16
   7928  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp2
   7929  f3d2				  -	      sty	temp1
   7930  f3d2				  -	      lda	#0
   7931  f3d2				  -	      ldx	#8
   7932  f3d2				  -	      asl	temp2
   7933  f3d2				  -div16_1
   7934  f3d2				  -	      rol
   7935  f3d2				  -	      cmp	temp1
   7936  f3d2				  -	      bcc	div16_2
   7937  f3d2				  -	      sbc	temp1
   7938  f3d2				  -div16_2
   7939  f3d2				  -	      rol	temp2
   7940  f3d2				  -	      dex
   7941  f3d2				  -	      bne	div16_1
   7942  f3d2				  -	      sta	temp1
   7943  f3d2				  -	      lda	temp2
   7944  f3d2				  -	      rts
   7945  f3d2					      endif		; .calledfunction_div16
   7946  f3d2
   7947  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	bankswitchmode
   7948  f3d2				  -BS_jsr
   7949  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	dumpbankswitch
   7950  f3d2				  -	      sta	dumpbankswitch
   7951  f3d2				  -	      endif
   7952  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	MCPDEVCART
   7953  f3d2				  -	      ora	#$18
   7954  f3d2				  -	      sta	$3000
   7955  f3d2				  -	      else
   7956  f3d2				  -	      sta	$8000
   7957  f3d2				  -	      endif
   7958  f3d2				  -	      pla
   7959  f3d2				  -	      tax
   7960  f3d2				  -	      pla
   7961  f3d2				  -	      rts
   7962  f3d2				  -
   7963  f3d2				  -BS_return
   7964  f3d2				  -	      pla		; bankswitch bank
   7965  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	dumpbankswitch
   7966  f3d2				  -	      sta	dumpbankswitch
   7967  f3d2				  -	      endif
   7968  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	BANKRAM
   7969  f3d2				  -	      sta	currentbank
   7970  f3d2				  -	      ora	currentrambank
   7971  f3d2				  -	      endif
   7972  f3d2				  -	      ifconst	MCPDEVCART
   7973  f3d2				  -	      ora	#$18
   7974  f3d2				  -	      sta	$3000
   7975  f3d2				  -	      else
   7976  f3d2				  -	      sta	$8000
   7977  f3d2				  -	      endif
   7978  f3d2				  -	      pla		; bankswitch $0 flag
   7979  f3d2				  -	      rts
   7980  f3d2					      endif
   7981  f3d2
   7982  f3d2				   checkselectswitch
   7983  f3d2		       ad 82 02 	      lda	SWCHB	; check the real select switch...
   7984  f3d5		       29 02		      and	#%00000010
   7985  f3d7				   checkselectswitchreturn
   7986  f3d7		       60		      rts
   7987  f3d8
   7988  f3d8				   checkresetswitch
   7989  f3d8		       ad 82 02 	      lda	SWCHB	; check the real reset switch...
   7990  f3db		       29 01		      and	#%00000001
   7991  f3dd		       60		      rts
   7992  f3de
   7993  f3de				  -	      ifconst	FINESCROLLENABLED
   7994  f3de				  -finescrolldlls
   7995  f3de				  -	      ldx	temp1	; first DLL index x3
   7996  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
   7997  f3de				  -	      and	#%11110000
   7998  f3de				  -	      ora	finescrolly
   7999  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
   8000  f3de				  -
   8001  f3de				  -	      ldx	temp2	; last DLL index x3
   8002  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
   8003  f3de				  -	      and	#%11110000
   8004  f3de				  -	      ora	finescrolly
   8005  f3de				  -	      eor	#(WZONEHEIGHT-1)
   8006  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
   8007  f3de				  -	      rts
   8008  f3de					      endif		; FINESCROLLENABLED
   8009  f3de
   8010  f3de				  -	      ifconst	USED_ADJUSTVISIBLE
   8011  f3de				  -adjustvisible
   8012  f3de				  -			; called with temp1=first visible zone *3, temp2=last visible zone *3
   8013  f3de				  -	      jsr	waitforvblankstart	; ensure vblank just started
   8014  f3de				  -	      ldx	visibleDLLstart
   8015  f3de				  -findfirstinterrupt
   8016  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
   8017  f3de				  -	      bmi	foundfirstinterrupt
   8018  f3de				  -	      inx
   8019  f3de				  -	      inx
   8020  f3de				  -	      inx
   8021  f3de				  -	      bne	findfirstinterrupt
   8022  f3de				  -foundfirstinterrupt
   8023  f3de				  -	      and	#%01111111	; clear the interrupt bit
   8024  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
   8025  f3de				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   8026  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
   8027  f3de				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   8028  f3de				  -	      ldx	overscanDLLstart
   8029  f3de				  -findlastinterrupt
   8030  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
   8031  f3de				  -	      bmi	foundlastinterrupt
   8032  f3de				  -	      dex
   8033  f3de				  -	      dex
   8034  f3de				  -	      dex
   8035  f3de				  -	      bne	findlastinterrupt
   8036  f3de				  -foundlastinterrupt
   8037  f3de				  -	      and	#%01111111	; clear the interrupt bit
   8038  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
   8039  f3de				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   8040  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
   8041  f3de				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   8042  f3de				  -			;now we need to set the new interrupts
   8043  f3de				  -	      clc
   8044  f3de				  -	      lda	temp1
   8045  f3de				  -	      adc	visibleDLLstart
   8046  f3de				  -	      tax
   8047  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
   8048  f3de				  -	      ora	#%10000000
   8049  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
   8050  f3de				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   8051  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
   8052  f3de				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   8053  f3de				  -	      clc
   8054  f3de				  -	      lda	temp2
   8055  f3de				  -	      adc	visibleDLLstart
   8056  f3de				  -	      tax
   8057  f3de				  -	      lda	DLLMEM,x
   8058  f3de				  -	      ora	#%10000000
   8059  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM,x
   8060  f3de				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   8061  f3de				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,x
   8062  f3de				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   8063  f3de				  -	      jsr	vblankresync
   8064  f3de				  -	      rts
   8065  f3de					      endif		; USED_ADJUSTVISIBLE
   8066  f3de
   8067  f3de				   vblankresync
   8068  f3de		       20 4e f4 	      jsr	waitforvblankstart	; ensure vblank just started
   8069  f3e1		       a9 00		      lda	#0
   8070  f3e3		       85 4d		      sta	visibleover
   8071  f3e5		       a9 03		      lda	#3
   8072  f3e7		       8d b2 01 	      sta	interruptindex
   8073  f3ea		       60		      rts
   8074  f3eb
   8075  f3eb				   createallgamedlls
   8076  f3eb		       a0 3c		      ldy	#(DLLLUTEND-DLLLUT)
   8077  f3ed				   createallgamedllsloop
   8078  f3ed		       88		      dey
   8079  f3ee		       b9 12 f4 	      lda	DLLLUT,y
   8080  f3f1		       99 00 18 	      sta	DLLMEM,y
   8081  f3f4				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   8082  f3f4				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET,y
   8083  f3f4					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   8084  f3f4		       c0 00		      cpy	#0
   8085  f3f6		       d0 f5		      bne	createallgamedllsloop
   8086  f3f8
   8087  f3f8				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   8088  f3f8				  -	      ldy	#(DLLLUTNONVISSTART-DLLLUTVISSTART)
   8089  f3f8				  -fixdoublebuffer
   8090  f3f8				  -	      dey
   8091  f3f8				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
   8092  f3f8				  -	      clc
   8093  f3f8				  -	      adc	#DOUBLEBUFFEROFFSET
   8094  f3f8				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
   8095  f3f8				  -	      dey
   8096  f3f8				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
   8097  f3f8				  -	      adc	#0
   8098  f3f8				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
   8099  f3f8				  -	      dey
   8100  f3f8				  -	      bne	fixdoublebuffer
   8101  f3f8					      endif
   8102  f3f8
   8103  f3f8				  -	      ifconst	BANKSET_DL_IN_CARTRAM
   8104  f3f8				  -			; N.B. banksets doesn't in-fact allow DL in cart-ram, so this conditional
   8105  f3f8				  -			; is always skipped. This is here in case some day the limitation is
   8106  f3f8				  -			; worked around, but it's untested.
   8107  f3f8				  -
   8108  f3f8				  -			; With bankset cart ram, we added $8000 to the DL address so plot
   8109  f3f8				  -			; functions would hit the cart-ram write-address. We need to subtract $80
   8110  f3f8				  -			; so Maria will read from the cart-ram read-address.
   8111  f3f8				  -	      ldy	#(DLLLUTNONVISSTART-DLLLUTVISSTART)
   8112  f3f8				  -fixbanksetaddresses
   8113  f3f8				  -	      dey
   8114  f3f8				  -	      dey
   8115  f3f8				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
   8116  f3f8				  -	      and	#%01111111
   8117  f3f8				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
   8118  f3f8				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   8119  f3f8				  -	      lda	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
   8120  f3f8				  -	      and	#%01111111
   8121  f3f8				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+DLLLUTVISSTART-DLLLUT,y
   8122  f3f8				  -	      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER
   8123  f3f8				  -	      dey
   8124  f3f8				  -	      bne	fixbanksetaddresses
   8125  f3f8					      endif		; BANKSET_DL_IN_CARTRAM
   8126  f3f8
   8127  f3f8		       ad 09 21 	      lda	paldetected
   8128  f3fb		       f0 0a		      beq	skippaladjust
   8129  f3fd		       a9 4f		      lda	#($0F|(WZONEHEIGHT*4))	; +15 lines
   8130  f3ff		       8d 06 18 	      sta	DLLMEM+6
   8131  f402				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   8132  f402				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+6
   8133  f402					      endif
   8134  f402					      if	WSCREENHEIGHT = 192
   8135  f402		       a9 4d		      lda	#($0D|(WZONEHEIGHT*4))	; +6 lines
   8136  f404				  -	      else
   8137  f404				  -	      lda	#($07|(WZONEHEIGHT*4))	; +6 lines
   8138  f404					      endif		;
   8139  f404		       8d 03 18 	      sta	DLLMEM+3
   8140  f407				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER
   8141  f407				  -	      sta	DLLMEM+DBOFFSET+3
   8142  f407					      endif		; DOUBLEBUFFER

   8156  f412					      if	WSCREENHEIGHT = 192

   8158  f415		       47 21 00 	      .byte.b	($07|(WZONEHEIGHT*4)),$21,$00	;  8 blank lines

   8258  f457				  -	      ifconst	DOUBLEBUFFER

   8264  f457				  -	      sta	interrupthold
   8265  f457				  -	      endif
   8266  f457				  -	      lda	doublebufferstate
   8267  f457				  -	      beq	flipdisplaybufferreturn	; exit if we're not in double-buffer
   8268  f457				  -
   8269  f457				  -	      jsr	terminatedisplaybuffer	; terminate the working buffer before we flip
   8270  f457				  -
   8271  f457				  -			; ensure we don't flip mid-display. otherwise the displayed DL will be the one the game is working on.
   8272  f457				  -
   8273  f457				  -flipdisplaybufferwait1
   8274  f457				  -	      lda	visibleover
   8275  f457				  -	      beq	flipdisplaybufferwait1

   8280  f457				  -
   8281  f457				  -quickbufferflip
   8282  f457				  -	      lda	doublebufferstate
   8283  f457				  -	      lsr		; /2, so we'll see 0 or 1, rather than 1 or 3
   8284  f457				  -	      tax
   8285  f457				  -
   8286  f457				  -	      lda	doublebufferminimumframetarget
   8287  f457				  -	      beq	skipminimumframecode
   8288  f457				  -	      lda	doublebufferminimumframeindex

   8290  f457				  -	      lda	doublebufferminimumframetarget
   8291  f457				  -	      sta	doublebufferminimumframeindex
   8292  f457				  -skipminimumframecode

   8295  f457				  -	      sta	DPPH
   8296  f457				  -	      lda	DLLMEMLutLo,x
   8297  f457				  -	      sta	DPPL
   8298  f457				  -
   8299  f457				  -	      lda	NewPageflipstate,x
   8300  f457				  -	      sta	doublebufferstate
   8301  f457				  -	      lda	NewPageflipoffset,x
   8302  f457				  -	      sta	doublebufferdloffset
   8303  f457				  -
   8304  f457				  -	      ifnconst	BANKSET_DL_IN_CARTRAM
   8305  f457				  -	      lda	doublebufferbufferdirty
   8306  f457				  -	      beq	flipdisplaybufferreturn
   8307  f457				  -
   8308  f457				  -			; The doublebuffer buffer is dirty, so the game code must have issued a savescreen recently.
   8309  f457				  -			; To make savescreen work with the new working buffer, we need to copy over the saved objects
   8310  f457				  -			; from the displayed buffer to the working buffer...
   8311  f457				  -
   8312  f457				  -	      lda	doublebufferdloffset
   8313  f457				  -	      eor	#DOUBLEBUFFEROFFSET
   8314  f457				  -	      sta	temp6	; make temp6 the anti-doublebufferdloffset variable
   8315  f457				  -
   8316  f457				  -	      ldx	#(WZONECOUNT-1)
   8317  f457				  -copybufferzoneloop
   8318  f457				  -
   8319  f457				  -	      lda	DLPOINTL,x
   8320  f457				  -	      clc
   8321  f457				  -	      adc	doublebufferdloffset
   8322  f457				  -	      sta	temp1
   8323  f457				  -	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   8324  f457				  -	      adc	#0
   8325  f457				  -	      sta	temp2
   8326  f457				  -
   8327  f457				  -	      lda	DLPOINTL,x
   8328  f457				  -	      clc
   8329  f457				  -	      adc	temp6
   8330  f457				  -	      sta	temp3
   8331  f457				  -	      lda	DLPOINTH,x
   8332  f457				  -	      adc	#0
   8333  f457				  -	      sta	temp4
   8334  f457				  -
   8335  f457				  -	      lda	dlendsave,x
   8336  f457				  -	      tay
   8337  f457				  -copybuffercharsloop
   8338  f457				  -	      lda	(temp3),y
   8339  f457				  -	      sta	(temp1),y
   8340  f457				  -	      dey
   8341  f457				  -	      bpl	copybuffercharsloop
   8342  f457				  -	      dex
   8343  f457				  -	      bpl	copybufferzoneloop

   8345  f457				  -	      sta	doublebufferbufferdirty
   8346  f457				  -	      endif		; ! BANKSET_DL_IN_CARTRAM

   8348  f457				  -

   8369  f457				  -	      ifconst	MOUSESUPPORT
   8370  f457				  -
   8371  f457				  -rotationalcompare
   8372  f457				  -			; old = 00 01 10 11
   8373  f457				  -	      .byte	$00, $01, $ff, $00	; new=00
   8374  f457				  -	      .byte	$ff, $00, $00, $01	; new=01
   8375  f457				  -	      .byte	$01, $00, $00, $ff	; new=10

   8386  f457				  -	      .byte	%0001, %0001, %0011, %0011

   8392  f457				  -	      .byte	%0000, %0001, %0010, %0011

   8394  f457				  -

   8396  f457				  -

   8398  f457				  -	      .byte	%0000, %1000, %0010, %1010

   8401  f457				  -	      .byte	%0101, %1101, %0111, %1111
   8402  f457				  -			; null change bits

   8404  f457				  -	      .byte	%0100, %0101, %0110, %0111
